title: Valentine's Day Beauty Trends That Are Popular on Pinterest
text: 15 Celebrity-Inspired Date-Night Beauty Looks Lip Stains It's easy to forget to touch up your lip color when you're on a date, but we all know your lipstick performs a disappearing act the more you eat and talk. (And no one wants to be the girl with awkward colored residue left behind the perimeter of your mouth.) This year, use a lip stain over a traditional cream formula for a more low maintenance way to add some color to your look. Try, a favorite of ours. Matte Eye Makeup Matte eye makeup has been popular for a few months now , and the look is still going strong. This year's take on the trend, however, includes blush pinks and rosy neutrals, though we'd be lying if we didn't admit to our current peach eye shadow obsession . Pinterest users are also getting their date night inspiration from red carpet beauty looks, such as Lily Collins at the Golden Globes . Half-Up Bun If you don't want to wear your hair up, go for this casual take on the classic chignon instead. Not only is it a fun and flirty look, but you've also got the best of both worlds: long pieces in front framing your face, while the top of your hair is pulled out of your way (the better to show off your eyes, that is). For more ideas, check out the most popular hairstyle on Pinterest here . At-Home Mani According to Pinterest, more and more people are skipping the salon and searching for easy nail art to try on their own. Paint on a cute Valentine's Day-inspired manicure for date night, and if your partner mentions it in conversation, you'll know they're a keeper. Or, if you're opting to have a Galentine's night-in, tackle these mani tutorials with your girls. That way you have someone to bounce design ideas off ofâ€”or laugh with when your nail art comes out looking more like a Pinterest fail. Learn how to DIY this cute Valentine's Day mani: Date Night is Coming Here's something to get all heart-eyed over. February 6, 2017
